metadata.title: CVE-2023-52493 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bus: mhi: host: Drop chan lock before queuing buffersEnsure read and write locks for the channel are not taken in succession bydropping the read lock from parse_xfer_event() such that a callback givento client can potentially queue buffers and acquire the write lock in thatprocess. Any queueing of buffers should be done without channel read lockacquired as it can result in multiple locks and a soft lockup.[mani: added fixes tag and cc'ed stable]
